dmca.title: Insurance Company Wants Duplicate Site Down
dmca.body:
Attn: User Support, DMCA Complaints
First Page
    
Digital Millennium Copyright Act - Infringement Notification
    
Business-at.com Ltd, ,[private], Horncastle, Lincolnshire, [private], England 
Telephone no [private]
    
We have faxed 54 pages, to support the alleged infringement. Each page has a number at the top to ensure that all pages are received.
    
After the recent Google update we appear to have lost most of our traffic, with our previously held search positions being replaced by an alleged copy of our homepage. We have made contact with the person responsible, who admits to using a "mechanism" to link to our website. This activity - link / mechanism was without my knowledge, consent or permission. Once the offending page had been indexed during the last update, the person responsible deleted the quotation.htm and put a redirect to his homepage at www.Cheap-Quote-Car-Insurance.co.uk
TAKING MY BUSINESS.
    
He claims that it is not his fault, and that Google is responsible. From researching into this, and gathering information about this type of situation, it would appear that this may have been done deliberately to gain search engine position. After many emails to this person, he agreed to redirect the traffic to my website, and include a robots.txt file to exclude his quotation.htm from being indexed again. I would be happy to forward all emails if requested (many have already been sent to various Google email addresses, help, search-results etc ... )
    
All of these emails have contained various pieces of information relating to this situation, one of the replies stated
    
Due to the huge impact this was having on my business, I requested the person to try and correct the situation, since Saturday 7th December 2002 the redirect has been put in place for 2 reasons:

To ensure google visitors / searches provide accurate results
To ensure that business/ revenue generated goes to the rightful owner
    
The search results listed by Google for the offending website are extracted from the cached version of the page, which is a copy of our homepage. This produces various pieces of text information returned which clearly shows our authorized brands "Insurance@com" and "Direct Choice Insurance". We would appreciate the removal of the copy entry being replaced with our original entries, eg: our previously held search engine positions like, No 1 position for UK Motorcycle Insurance, etc etc. (sic)
    
The enclosed pages have been marked with either the word "copy" or "genuine original" were (sic) appropriate also search results marked with an "X" circled.
    
1.Identify in sufficient detail that we believe has been infringed. (sic)
The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on www.Insurance-at.com which has been operating for 2 years. Both in the visible format and also in the HTML source code, both of which clearly show copyright belonging to Business-at.com Limited. (sic)

2. Material identified as infringing the copyrighted work listed in item No1 above is the Google search engine listing /entry, description (sic) as extracted from and including the cached version of the website page below: www.Cheap-Quote-Car-insurance.co.uk/quotation.htm
    
Selection of effected (sic) search terms (this is not a complete list - as there are potentially hundreds due to the various associated insurance search terms):
    
buildings contents insurance
car insurance
car insurance uk
cheapest car insurance
cheapest car insurance quotes
cheapest car insurance quotes direct
cheapest life insurance quotes direct
cheapest life insurance quotes direct (sic)
cheapest uk life insurance
cheapest uk life insurance quotes direct
cheapest uk motorcycle insurance
cheapest uk motorcycle insurance (sic)
quotes
contents insurance@com
    
home insurance
home insurance uk
income protection
income protection insurance
life insurance uk
mortgage insurance
mortgage insurance uk
motorcycle insurance
motorcycle insurance uk
uk car insurance
uk home insurance
uk life insurance
uk mortgage insurance
  
Infringing web page: search result description as extracted from and including the cached version of the website page below: www.Cheap-Quote-Car-insurance.co.uk/quotation.htm
    
3. Contact information: [private]@insurance-at.com
4. Contact information for offending website: [private]@cyberbird.co.uk
5. Statement: I have a good faith belief that use of the copyright materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
6. Statement: I swear under penalty of perjury, that the information in this notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
7. Signed by:
          [private]		11 December 2002
    
    PLEASE CALL ME FOR INFORMATION - TO DISCUSS THE DETAILS
